DDNS.description: The Dynamic Domain Name Service (DDNS) Protocol
DDNS.longDescription: This object shall be used to represent the dynamic domain name service (DDNS) protocol.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

DDNSEnable.description: This indicates whether the dynamic DNS is enabled.
DDNSEnable.longDescription: The value of this property shall enable or disable the dynamic DNS.

DomainName.description: If the type of DDNS is set to Custom, this domain name will be sent to the DNS server.
DomainName.longDescription: If the type of DDNS is set to DHCP, this property becomes read-only.

DomainNameSource.description: This indicates the source of the domain name.
DomainNameSource.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the source of the domain name.

enumDescriptions.DHCP: Use domain name obtained from the DHCP server.

LenovoDNS.description: This is the schema definition for the Domain Name System(DNS).
LenovoDNS.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent a DNS resource for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

DDNS.description: The Dynamic Domain Name Service (DDNS) Protocol
DDNS.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of objects used to represent the dynamic domain name service (DDNS) protocol.

DNSEnable.description: This indicates whether DNS is enabled.
DNSEnable.longDescription: The value of this property shall enable or disable the IMM Domain Name System (DNS).

IPv4Address1.description: This is the DNS IPv4 primary Address.
IPv4Address1.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the DNS IPv4 primary Address.

IPv4Address2.description: This is the DNS IPv4 secondary Address.
IPv4Address2.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the DNS IPv4 secondary Address.

IPv4Address3.description: This is the DNS IPv4 tertiary Address.
IPv4Address3.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the DNS IPv4 tertiary Address.

IPv6Address1.description: This is the DNS IPv6 primary Address.
IPv6Address1.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the DNS IPv6 primary Address.

IPv6Address2.description: This is the DNS IPv6 secondary Address.
IPv6Address2.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the DNS IPv6 secondary Address.

IPv6Address3.description: This is the DNS IPv6 tertiary Address.
IPv6Address3.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the DNS IPv6 tertiary Address.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

PreferredAddresstype.description: This chooses the preferred DNS servers when both IPv4 and IPv6 DNS Server address are set.
PreferredAddresstype.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the preferred DNS servers.

title: #LenovoDNS.v1_0_0.LenovoDNS
